Definition at line 72 of file timemodel.h.

#define NOW ( )    TimeModel::getNanoseconds()

returns the time now in the internal time resolution (eg. Nanoseconds). This function is redundant to Time::getTime(), but this so so often required/used than it deserves a shortcut.
